CHAT.comment: the letter is to the Terminator; After a lengthy discussion about how to spell Schwarzenegger (and I'm not sure if I have it right) , everyone agrees just to write to Terminator; This is a big spelling hurdle , and Mot won't let Chi use his Terminator Card and instead encourages him to break it down into component words such as term and in; The session is lively with good jokes about spelling Schwarzenegger , and Chi's writing skills seem to be okay; He puts dear in himself and spells it right , but puts a lowercase i for I until Mot corrects him; Chi and Mot discuss content of a letter before writing -- Chi describes writing a return address in school and Mot says there's more to letters than that; Chi determines text
Dear Terminator I want a reel Terminator

u.a: MOT said they were writing letters in school with return address and everything
FAT comes in to watch then goes to kids' room to play with Bro
strict but not serious; or serious but not strict
EXP or Fat talking in background
pandemonium as adults try to figure out how to spell
obviously disappointed to be out on the joke
I'm not sure where this comes from
drum sounds in background on tv or Nintendo - is turned down after a few seconds
Nintendo or something in the background
EXP answers Mot's question about kids in study
